name: Kitty Latte P.I
description:
Kitty Latte P.I - Case of the missing carton

Stealth game made for #GBJAM8

You play as a private investigator trying to follow the clues to the Missing Carton that has mysteriously disappeared.  Avoid the guard dogs as you traverse the level, collecting the clues to the open the Bone Gates and delving deeper into the Guard Dogs Fortress.

Controls

  • WASD/Arrow keys - move
  • B - Hide

Tools Used

  • PyxelEdit - Art
  • Unity
  • Visual Studio

Music

  • Audionautix.com

Effects 

  •  BXFR
  • Royalty free effects
